title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 235/90 of 29 January 1990 fixing for the 1990 marketing year the Community offer prices for cucumbers applicable with regard to Spain
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 235/90
of 29 January 1990
fixing for the 1990 marketing year the Community offer prices for cucumbers applicable with regard to Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. For the 1990 marketing year, the Community offer prices for cucumbers (CN code 0707 00 11, 19), expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- February (from 11 to 20): 144,61
(from 21 to 28): 109,79
- March: 93,13
- April: 78,37
- May: 65,97
- June: 56,92
- July: 48,36
- August: 48,73
- September: 57,72
- from 1 October to 10 November: 80,58
2. For the purpose of calculating the Spanish offer price, the prices for cucumbers, not produced under glass, imported from Spain shall, after deduction of customs duties, be multiplied by the following conversion factors:
- from 11 February to 30 September: 1,30,
- from 1 October to 10 November: 1,00.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 11 February 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 January 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 363, 13. 12. 1989, p. 3.
(2) OJ No L 371, 20. 12. 1989, p. 28.
